dialogue.String: Your #���� broke!1�
This magic doll has had a seal placed upon it.�
The old, worn-out seal breaks as you approach.�
You can sense something terrible behind the door.You should probably refrain from entering.1�
Do you want to leave the room?Yes.Not yet.1�
Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�
What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Recollections.1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
Greetings, friend, and welcome to the Mog Merchants Extraordinaire!Here, you can exchange your hard-earned kupons for all sorts of stupendous souvenirs!1�
...Or so we thought, kupo.Sadly, it seems that my cohorts are slacking off on the job.They're nowhere to be found!1�
Unless they come back, I fear that your 3���� is nothing but a worthless scrap of parchment.I know! Perhaps you could help me track them down, kupo?1�
How about it?Let's do it.Do your own job.1�
Oh, a thousand thank-yous, kind adventurer!Without my accomplices--er, associates--the boss's plans will all be for naught!I mean, our customers will be distraught, kupo!1�

<Ahem>! As I was saying...I'd be ever so grateful if you could find our  �[horticulturist/ironmonger/pyrotechnician/pawnbroker],  �[Kupatete/Kupignol/Kupuckl/Kupert], and escort  �[her/his/his/his] procrastinating moogle posterior back to work.1�
They're far too lazy to have ventured outside this keep, so you should be able to find them loafing around here somewhere, kupo.1�
Hmph. Fine, be that way!No fur off my nose, kupo.That's one less prize wasted on an ungrateful adventurer.1�

<Ahem>! As I was saying...I'd be ever so grateful if you could find our  �[horticulturist/ironmonger/pyrotechnician/pawnbroker],  �[Kupatete/Kupignol/Kupuckl/Kupert], and escort  �[her/his/his/his] procrastinating moogle posterior back to work.1�
They're far too lazy to have ventured outside this keep, so you should be able to find them loafing around here somewhere, kupo.1�
Just don't tell the boss I was sleeping on the job. Deal, kupo?In return, that 3���� will allow you to take part in this festival's grand finale...1�
The Mega Mog Bonanza-Rama-Palooza!Doesn't that name positively scream ��excitement��!?1�
What's even more exciting are the exclusive prizes you could win, kupo.If I were you, why, I'd flap my little wings as furiously as I could and make for the main event without delay!1�
Greetings, friend, and welcome to the Mog Merchants Extraordinaire!Here, you can exchange your hard-earned kupons for all sorts of stupendous souvenirs!1�
Welcome to the Mog Merchants Extraordinaire souvenir shop, where you can exchange that hard-earned 3���� of yours for scores of spectacular prizes!1�
What's that? You don't have a 3����!?Er...then just forget I said anything, kupo!1�

Or, if you fancy yourself to have nerves of darksteel...!The courage to look fear in the eye and make it your master...!You could go win yourself one at our event in the castle baileys!Do you have it in you, kupo!?1�
Slacking on the job!? Me, kupo!? Why, I never--!No, I was just...ah...patrolling this area for stray beastmen!Yeah, that's the ticket!1�

Can't have those fiends assaulting our honored festival-goers, now, can we?Well, <ahem>...everything seems to be in order here, so let's return!And for your troubles, why don't I exchange that 3���� you've got there for this shiny new 3����?1�
